channel.title: Zarketh - BETA
channel.description:
Zarketh is a new server still in beta mode. Take time to travel through the many cities of Zarketh to undergo new adventures and learn new skills.
[URL=http://"http://zarketh.com/zarketh/Impulse1/"]PLAY NOW![/URL]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/90a49e7f405ac579329a1ba7f2c9e178.png[/img]
I have tried making this thread as neat as possible for easy reading.
[SIZE="4"][COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Pictures[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SPOIL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/geqwG42l.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OIVHtzCl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1K27irRl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZWB4Byql.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N3qX7hml.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d0ZdKYjl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l91HvDjl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BdtY8Qgl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oIVk9sel.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tSi8IDal.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rte51bzl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1NbQPqOl.jpg[/img] [/SPOIL]
[SIZE="4"][COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Full feature list[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SPOIL] [SIZE="4"][COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Skills[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SPOIL]
[ul][list] [*]Melee [list] [*]Correct following and distances [*]Correct weapon speeds [*]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, attack and defence) [*]Correct animations [*]Perfect hit delays [/list] [*]Range [list] [*]Correct projectiles and animations [*]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence) [*]Correct bow and crossbow speeds [*]Correct animations [*]Correct distances and hit delays [*]Perfect following [/list] [*]Magic [list] [*]Correct graphics, distances, magic effects and spell speed [*]Perfected hit delays [*]Correct animations [*]Correct distance and magic following [*]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence) [/list] Perfected NPC sizes [/list] [*][B]Runecrafting [/B]- [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Use of the Abyss [*]All altars working [*]Correct multiple crafting [*]Use of Pouches included [/list] [*][B]Agility [/B]- [COLOR="Yellow"]80%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable - [COLOR="Yellow"]50%[/COLOR] [*]All obstacles around Zarketh working - [COLOR="Yellow"]55%[/COLOR] [*]Correct animations used [/list] [*][B]Herblore[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Correct animations [*]All potions can be made [*]Correct first and secondary ingredients [*]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion) [*]Can make extreme potions [*]Can make overloads (note extremes/overload stats will be reduced to super set stats if in wild) [/list] [*][B]Thieving[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula [*]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards [*]Correct animations and graphics used [/list] [*][B]Fletching[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All logs can be fletched [*]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log) [*]Can string bows [*]Can fletch crossbow bolts and tip them [/list] [*][B]Slayer[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Five global slayer masters [*]Rewards system [*]Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks [*]Can sell monster heads to slayer master for money [*]Slayer gem working [*]All equipment working [*]Correct requirements for slayer monsters [/list] [*][B]Mining[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Emptying and refilling rocks [*]All ores can be mined [*]Correct pickaxe finding and animations [/list] [*][B]Smithing[/B] - [COLOR="Yellow"]95%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All bars can be made - [COLOR="Yellow"]35%[/COLOR] [*]All bars can be smithed [*]All equipment can be produced [*]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used [/list] [*][B]Cooking[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All food can be cooked (mostly fishing including Cavefish and Rocktail) [*]Correct burning formula (can get cooking gauntlets from cooking guild) [*]Correct animation and timing used [/list] [*][B]Fishing[/B] -[COLOR="Lime"] 100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All fish can be caught (includes Cavefish and Rocktail) [*]Correct item requirements [*]Fishing spots located all around the world [*]Correct animations [/list] [*][B]Firemaking[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All logs lightable [*]The Pyrelord familiar gives you an extra 500 xp on each log [*]Adding and depleting of lightened logs [*]Ashes appear after logs burn out [*]Correct animations [/list] [*][B]Woodcutting[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Falling and regrowing trees [*]Correct hatchet finding [*]Correct hatchet animations [/list] [*][B]Farming [/B]- [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Can plant herbs only (atm) [*]100% diseasing, dying won't be added (annoys players) [*]Can plant all seeds [*]Proper system (compost, seeding, it growing in stages etc) [*]All patches can be used [*]Correct animations used [*]100% Picking system [/list] [*][B]Hunter [/B]- [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Can bird snare birds [*]Can pitfall trap animals [*]Can dismantle traps [*]Can box trap chinchompas [*]Can set up to 5 traps (depending on level) [*]Can jump over pitfall traps [*]Can catch butterflies (and release) [*]Correct animations used [/list] [*][B]Summoning[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Correct pouches used [*]Correct spawning animations and graphics [*]Perfect summoning interface [*]Can use individual familiar special moves [*]Can dismiss familiar [*]Can renew familiars timer [*]Beast of Burdens [*]Correct overall graphics and animations used [/list] [*][B]Foraging[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All 10 tribes with tasks [*]All resource spots functional [*]Rewards system [*]Rewards obtainable [*]Obstacles all in play [*]Experience and leveling up [*]Notes item added (like slayer gem to keep track of task) [*]Skill tab interface [*]Forage point system [/list][/ul]
[/SPOIL]
[COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"][SIZE="4"] Quests[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SPOIL]
[ul][*][B]Cook's Assistant[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [*][B]Death Plateau [/B]- [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [*][B]Desert Treasure [/B]- [COLOR="Green"]100%[/COLOR] [*][B]Goblin Diplomacy[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [*][B]Horror from the Deep[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [*][B]Lost City[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [*][B]Lunar Diplomacy[/B] - [COLOR="Red"]0%[/COLOR] [*][B]Recipe for Disaster[/B] - [COLOR="Red"]0%[/COLOR] [*][B]The Fremennik Isles[/B] - [COLOR="Red"]0%[/COLOR] [*][B]The Fremennik Trials[/B] - [COLOR="Red"]0%[/COLOR] [*][B]Troll Stronghold[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [*][B]Wolf's Whistle[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR][/ul]
[/SPOIL]
[SIZE="4"][COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Travelling[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SPOIL]
[ul][*][B]Amulet of Glory[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Can teleport to four locations (Edgeville, Draynor Village, Karamja and Al-Kharid) [*]Correct animations and graphics used [/list] [*][B]Ring of Duelling[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Can teleport to three locations (Duel Arena, Castle Wars and Fist of Guthix) [*]Correct animations and graphics used [/list] [*][B]Games Necklace[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Can teleport to 2 locations (Burthrope, Barbarian outpost.) [*]Correct animations and graphics used [/list] [*][B]Skills Necklace[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Can teleport to four locations (Fishing guild, Mining guild, Crafting guild, Cooking guild) [*]Correct animations and graphics used [/list] [*][B]Teleport tablets[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All tabs usable [*]Correct animations and graphics used [/list] [*][B]Teleport Scrolls[/B] - [COLOR="Red"]0%[/COLOR] [*][B]Fairy Rings[/B] -[COLOR="Lime"] 100%[/COLOR] [*][B]Familiar Transport[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Hunting familiars can teleport you to hunting areas [/list] [*][B]Change of spawn/home locations[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Can speak to Sir Tiffy Cashien to change [*]Four unique locations to choose from (Lumbridge, Edgeville(after desert treasure), Camelot, Varrock and Falador) [*]Can use the Home teleport spell/tablet for your location [/list] [*][B]Spell book teleports[/B] - [COLOR="Yellow"]90%[/COLOR] [list] [*]New teleport system [*]All locations added - [COLOR="Yellow"]80%[/COLOR] [/list] [*][B]Ports[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Can travel to many locations (Mos le harmless, Karamja, Port Sarim, Catherby, Ardounge and more) [*]Can travel to Entrana(must wear no armour; can't wear armour on island) [/list] [*][B]Wilderness Obelisks[/B] - [COLOR="Red"]0%[/COLOR][/ul]
[/SPOIL]
[COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"][SIZE="4"]Bosses[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SPOIL]
[ul][*][B]Giant Mole [/B]- [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Correct animations used [*]Correct digging spots and graphics used (does this under half health) [*]Correct max hit, defence and attack formula [/list]
[list] [*]Surrounded by Kalphites [*]Can range and magic [*]Correct projectiles, maxhits and animations (multi hitting) [*]Two forms to defeat [/list] [*][B]Dagannoth Kings[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Three different bosses [*]Correct accuracy, max hit and defence formulas [*]Correct projectiles and graphics used [*]Spinolyps surrounding the battle area [*]Spinolyps have their draining effect [/list] [*][B]Chaos Elemental[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Three attacks (disarming, teleporting and destroying) [*]Correct projectiles and graphics used [*]Correct animations used [*]Multi attacking [*]Perfect accuracy, defence and max hit formula [/list] [*][B]King Black Dragon[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Four breaths (Dragonfire, Icefire, Shockfire and Poisonfire) [*]Perfect defence, max hit and accuracy formula [*]Requires anti or dragonfire shield [*]Correct animations and projectiles used [*]Multi attacking [/list] [*][B]General Graador[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range [*]Correct range attack (multi hits) [*]Correct animations and graphics used [*]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit) [/list] [*][B]Kree'arra[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range [*]Correct range and magic attack (multi hits) [*]Correct animations and graphics used [*]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit) [/list] [*][B]Commander Zilyana[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range [*]Has a special attack that charges up and attack opponent [*]Correct animations and graphics used [*]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit) [/list] [*][B]K'ril Tsusaroth[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range [*]Correct magic attack (multi hits) [*]Correct animations and graphics used [*]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit) [/list] [*][B]Barrelchest[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Correct animation and graphics used [*]Can use a range attack [*]Perfect formulas [/list] [*][B]Adamant Dragon (custom)[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Must have finished 'The Monk's Sin' to access lair [*]Must use the Enchanted Shield from the quest [*]Must use Ice gloves or it will disntegrate your weapon [*]Uses magic, range and dragonfire as long range attacks [*]Can use melee if close [*]Correct animations, projectiles and graphics used [/list]
[list] [*]Must use a pickaxe to break outer shell [*]Once shell is broken 4 lava creatures arise from the lava (not included in video) [*]Uses a range attack(rocks fall from ceiling after slamming tail in ground) [*]Correct animations and graphics used [*]Perfect formulas [/list]
[list] [*]When using the range attack it will splash off and hit the surrounding players, if no surrounding players that person will be hit again [*]Uses 2 types of magic attacks, one will drain your prayer, summoning or magic. [*]Will melee if close [*]Stomps on players if they are underneath [*]Correct animations, projectiles and graphics used [*]Perfect formulas [/list]
[list] [*]Calls upon minions at 3/4 health [*]Correct animations, graphics [*]Perfect formulas [/list][/ul]
[/SPOIL]
[SIZE="4"][COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Mini-games[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SPOIL]
[ul][*][B]Pest Control[/B] - [COLOR="Yellow"]75%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All three levels of boats - 33.3% [*]NPC vs NPC [*]Correct interfaces [/list] [*][B]Fight Pits[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Correct timer [*]NPC shouts out time randomly [*]After entering, free-for-all [*]Last fighter in gets tokkul as reward (perfect formula) [/list] [*][B]Fight Caves[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]21 waves [*]Perfect monster effects [*]Correct animations, projectiles and graphics used [*]End reward is firecape and tokkul [/list] [*][B]Castle Wars[/B] - [COLOR="Red"]0%[/COLOR] [*][B]Warrior Guild[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Animators work perfectly [*]Must have 100 tokens before entering the Cyclopes room [*]Defender drop depending on what defender you have [*]10 tokens crumble every minute [/list] [*][B]Barrows[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All brothers working with effects and so on [*]Projectiles and graphics used are correct [*]Must have 6 kills before entering the tomb and looting the chest [*]Perfect rewards [/list] [*][B]Treasure Trials[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]All three levels working [*]15-20 different clues to embark within those individual levels [*]Correct rewards [*]Correct monsters dropping [*]Puzzle boxes [*]Uri emotes & double agents [/list] [*][B]Mage Arena[/B] - [COLOR="Lime"]100%[/COLOR] [list] [*]Kolodian located in Mage Bank [*]All correct rounds [*]Correct graphics, animations, requirements and projectiles used [*]Can obtain both staff and cape from Statue room. [/list][/ul]
[/SPOIL] [/SPOIL]

item.title: Zarketh - BETA
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

Zarketh is a new server still in beta mode. Take time to travel through the many cities of Zarketh to undergo new adventures and learn new skills.

PLAY NOW!

90a49e7f405ac579329a1ba7f2c9e178.png767×508

I have tried making this thread as neat as possible for easy reading.

[SPOIL]

[ul][list]
[]Melee
[list]
[]Correct following and distances
[]Correct weapon speeds
[]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, attack and defence)
[]Correct animations
[]Perfect hit delays
[/list]
[]Range
[list]
[]Correct projectiles and animations
[]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence)
[]Correct bow and crossbow speeds
[]Correct animations
[]Correct distances and hit delays
[]Perfect following
[/list]
[]Magic
[list]
[]Correct graphics, distances, magic effects and spell speed
[]Perfected hit delays
[]Correct animations
[]Correct distance and magic following
[]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence)
[/list]
Perfected NPC sizes
[/list]
[]Runecrafting - [COLOR=“Lime”]100%[/COLOR]
[list]
[]Use of the Abyss
[]All altars working
[]Correct multiple crafting
[]Use of Pouches included
[/list]

[list]

[]All potions can be made

[]Can make extreme potions
[]Can make overloads (note extremes/overload stats will be reduced to super set stats if in wild)
[/list]

[list]
[]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula
[]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards
[]Correct animations and graphics used
[/list]
[]Fletching - [COLOR=“Lime”]100%[/COLOR]

[]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)

[/list]

[]All equipment working
[]Correct requirements for slayer monsters
[/list]

[]Emptying and refilling rocks
[]All ores can be mined

[/list]

[list]

[]Correct burning formula (can get cooking gauntlets from cooking guild)
[]Correct animation and timing used
[/list]
[]Fishing -[COLOR=“Lime”] 100%[/COLOR]
[list]
[]All fish can be caught (includes Cavefish and Rocktail)
[]Correct item requirements
[]Fishing spots located all around the world
[]Correct animations
[/list]

[]All logs lightable

[/list]

[]Can plant herbs only (atm)
[]100% diseasing, dying won’t be added (annoys players)

[/list]

[]Can pitfall trap animals

[list]
[]All 10 tribes with tasks

[/list][/ul]

[/SPOIL]

[SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“DeepSkyBlue”]Travelling[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SPOIL]

[ul][]Amulet of Glory - [COLOR=“Lime”]100%[/COLOR]
[list]
[]Can teleport to four locations (Edgeville, Draynor Village, Karamja and Al-Kharid)

[]Hunting familiars can teleport you to hunting areas
[/list]

[list]
[]Can speak to Sir Tiffy Cashien to change

[/list]

[list]

[/list]

[SPOIL]

[ul][]Giant Mole - [COLOR=“Lime”]100%[/COLOR]
[list]

[]Correct digging spots and graphics used (does this under half health)

[/list]

[list]
[]Surrounded by Kalphites
[]Can range and magic
[]Correct projectiles, maxhits and animations (multi hitting)

[list]
[]Four breaths (Dragonfire, Icefire, Shockfire and Poisonfire)
[]Perfect defence, max hit and accuracy formula
[]Requires anti or dragonfire shield
[]Correct animations and projectiles used
[]Multi attacking
[/list]
[]General Graador - [COLOR=“Lime”]100%[/COLOR]
